titles.title: Auto Loan Limit Adjustment Act
To amend the Home Owners' Loan Act to remove the limitation on investments by Federal savings associations in consumer auto loans.
Auto Loan Limit Adjustment Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary: Auto Loan Limit Adjustment Act - Amends the Home Owners' Loan Act to permit a federal savings association to invest in, sell, or otherwise deal in auto loans and leases acquired for personal, family, or household purposes.
